songs.title: Funky
songs.lyrics:
[Refrain]
It's been dope
It's been sick
It's been funky
It's been hip

Look at my wings
They're fantasy, they're fairy
Now you are looking at me
You don't have 'em, I'm the boss
I'll give you where it hurts
With all my fairy dust
You roll crazy like a dice
Cause of my wings, my glitter
And oh my mind!

[Pre-Chorus]
It's been dope
It's been sick
It's been funky
It's been hip

[Chrous]
They say I'm nobody, I'm not worth anything, but I know that's just envy
With my wings they will go crazy
Cause' they shine more than those lazy
And if they don't get to buy my heart, then I don't consider 'em a f*cking threat
Funky
